item.description:
At this meetUp we will explore HOW information becomes "News". We will also explore how and why information might get "buried" and not appear on / in the news. Who decides what legitimate "News" is? How do YOU decide what is legitimate information?

Our discussion will be centered on the book CENSORED 2009 - The Top 25 Censored Stories of 2007-2008.

We will be watching clips from CNN, Scott Ritter, the film Control Room, and more which will illustrate the topic further. Alternative Media lists will be discussed and distributed.

All are welcome!
Organic Refreshments will be served.
FREE
PLEASE BRING A FRIEND.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: THE NEWS : Media & You
